title: How do I know whether my phone uses the UIM card or the Wi-Fi connection to access the Internet?
answer: If ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45441)Â is available on the right upper corner of your phone screen, your phone accesses the Internet using the Wi-Fi connection. Your phone prefers Wi-Fi than a UIM/SIM card for Internet use
